reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. BULLOCK v. BAGERT, 377 So.2d 121 (La. 1979)

caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA EX REL. JAMES BULLOCK v. BERNARD BAGERT, JUDGE, ORLEANS

opinion.posture: In re James Bullock, applying for writ of mandamus and prohibition. Parish of Orleans. Number unknown.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ granted. The district court is ordered to act on relator's application.
